verses.roman:
anurāgera lakṣaṇa ei,--'vidhi' nāhi māne
tāṅra ājñā bhāṅge tāṅra saṅgera kāraṇe

synonyms: anurāgera—of real affection; lakṣaṇa—symptom; ei—this; vidhi—the regulation; nāhi māne—does not care for; tāṅra—His; ājñā—order; bhāṅge—neglects; tāṅra—His; saṅgera—association; kāraṇe—for the purpose of.
translation: Indeed, it is a symptom of real affection that one breaks the order of the Supreme Personality of Godhead, not caring for the regulative principles, to associate with Him.
